page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF------?
page.content: I live in Milton Of Campsie which is a small village near Kilsyth.I live in a family of 5 of which I'm the youngest. We have a lot of pets including over 50 pigeons,30 tropical fish,2 dogs,and a parrot. I get my breakfast at 7.30am then I take the dogs out for a walk.I watch T.V. till it is time to get the bus at 8.15am,then we pick up folk on the way to school.I get to school at 8.40am. School starts at 9.00-3.35pm.We have 5 subjects during school which are Modern Studies,History,Maths,English and Food and Nutrition. After school is finished and I get home, I sometimes play golf. After a while I go in to get my dinner after which I go to the pigeon club for 3 hours. When we get home I watch T.V. then I go to bed.
